attributes.action: Repay carbon taxes when it is proven that mankinds CO2 emissions have no detrimental effect on the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Carbon taxes are based on ideological theories about climate change that are not 100% scientifically proven.

Sceptics are dismissed, and only those scientists that support the climate change theory are acknowledged.

Apart from a large number of scientists who disagree with the climate change theory, and that emissions of CO2 by man have no effect on climate change, there is also a "theory" that increasing the concentration of CO2 actually benefits the environment.

I petition the PM to pledge that when science proves that the current climate change theory is in fact a lie.

That when scientists prove mankind’s emissions of CO2 have no detrimental effect to the environment, that he repays all the "green" taxes to people.
